item.description:
Friends of Beverly Animals (FOBA) 2nd Annual Funky Fur Ball. Join FOBA for an evening of fun! Live music by Music Maximus, Dancing and Prizes.


Proceeds to benefit the feeding and medical care of homeless animals and long-term goal of establishing an animal shelter in Beverly. FOBA is an all-volunteer non-profit organization dedicated to the care of homeless animals in Beverly and surrounding areas.

Tickets are $20.00 advance purchase or $25.00 at the door. To purchase in advance, please contact Bonnie (978) 922-7190 or Linda (978) 927-2060.

The furball will be held Friday, May 21st - 7 p.m. to 11 p.m. at the Italian Community Club (ICC), 302 Rantoul Street, Beverly, MA
Casual Dress, Cash Bar, Refreshments

We look forward to seeing you at this event!
Vicki
item.name: Funky Fur Ball
